step5: Step 1: On your phone, open the play store/app store and type Hike Messenger in the search bar. Step 2: Tap on the Hike Messenger from the list of apps shown, mostly, it will be the first item on that list.
step6: Don’t want to share your phone number but still chat with someone? Just shout out your Hike ID Tired of the whole — give me a missed call routine? Just search for your friend’s Hike ID and start chatting.
step7: Speaking of the most trending messaging apps, one name that we won't afford to miss is Hike Messenger app owned by Kavin Bharti Mittal. With over 100 million users, this homegrown messaging app is giving fair competition, the world's most preferred messenger app.
